original_text: So the spirit took me up, and brought me into the inner court; and, behold, the glory of the Lord filled the house.
korean_text: 영이 나를 들어 데리고 안뜰에 들어가시기로 내가 보니 여호와의 영광이 성전에 가득하더라

sentences.original_text: So the spirit took me up
and brought me into inner court
and, behold, the glory of the Lord
